text: (mese tibiyadi) allahge margayehi kavurun (taman un hiti sthanaya athæra dama) pitamam vi yanneda, ohu bhumiyehi sæpa pahasu apamana sthanayanda, vividha sæpa sampatda at kara ganneya. kavurun ho tama nivasa athæra dama pitamam vi allah desatada, ohuge dutaya desatada yana margayehi miya giyahot ohuge vatina phalavipaka niyata vasayenma allah kerehi anivaryaya vanneya. (mandayat mevænnanta) allah itamat pav ksama karanneku vasayenda, dayava pahala karanneku vasayenda sitinneya
